pr_title: Handling `null` attributes when migrating quickvalues widgets.

timeline.message: Handle `null` values for `show_data_table`/`show_pie_chart` when migrating quick values.
Handling missing values for `show_data_table`/`show_pie_chart` when installing legacy dashboard.
Handling missing values for `show_data_table`/`show_pie_chart` when installing legacy dashboard.

timeline.bodyText: I think a few simple unit tests would be in order here to test all possible combinations.
timeline.author: alex-konn
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -186,8 +188,10 @@ static QuickValuesConfig create(
                 query,
                 Optional.ofNullable(streamId),
                 field,
-                showDataTable,
-                showPieChart,
+                (showDataTable == null || !showDataTable) && (showPieChart == null || !showPieChart)
